alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Knox (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 31 at 11:59AM EDT until further notice by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River near Bedford and at Shoals. White River at Hazleton. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River near Rivervale and at Williams. White River at Edwardsport and at Petersburg. .Widespread lowland flooding continues along the East Fork White River from Rivervale to Shoals....and along the White River at Edwardsport to Hazleton. Moderate flooding is occurring on the White River...at Petersburg...with brief moderate flooding possible at Hazleton Saturday. Moderate flooding is expected to end on the White River by Sunday. The East Fork White River has crested and is forecast to continue falling...while the crest on the White River will slowly pass Petersburg late today. Minor flooding is expected to end on the East Fork White River early next week...and on the White River...on Sunday at Edwardsport...while continuing at downriver points through next week. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Hazleton. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, A flood of this height causes great agricultural damage from June through August. Some river cabin residents evacuate. Most local roads flood. Several oil fields are inaccessible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 24.0 feet tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated late this evening.
